page.title: 11EMPLOYMENT
page.content:
A survey was carried out by the 4th year children at{OUSTON JUNIOR SCHOOL} in the village of OUSTON in order to discover what{JOBS PEOPLE LIVING IN {OUSTON}did and how in fact they{ {TRAVELLED}to reach their place of work.
The results that were obtained gave rise to the view that people lived in OUSTON not only because it is a pleasant and modern area in which to live but also because of its close proximity to places of work.
It also gave some indication of the higher social group generally living in OUSTON.
